documents.document: Listening to @replyall's episode #86 Man of the People by Reply All en route to work. I'm obsessed. https://t.co/Hw6G6Q7MPJ
Is it more agressive or pointless to tweet at ppl/companies u want 2 work for? Was thinking "pls hire me I admire you greatly and can write"
All I've ever wanted in a podcast. https://t.co/npdbOg9hbo
I used to go to the gym and watch Netflix on the treadmill but wifi is too slow now so I'm listening to political podcasts... #bodyandmind
My journo friends must listen to this, lots of smart people. Let's do our job. https://t.co/fp2dDHhlDL https://t.co/fWdapNBlzX
Or maybe we're the daughter.
We are all the Dad in the library reading a strawberry shortcake comic to his daughter rolling on the floor screaming.
@Girly_Juice I love this
Friends who flu together stay together? @HollyIsWyder ðŸ¤¢
Today a therapist called me spunky.
@Girly_Juice I've thought about this before
"You're a nerd and you love the man." - my boyfriend after I said I didn't feel bad that he got a ttc ticket for not paying.
"At sea if the boat sinks the captain dies. That's why I want to be a passenger." - Josh, 7
Sometimes I see perfect winged eye liner on someone else and I cry to smear the feeble attempt I made off my face. Teach me pls.
I went on vacation without telling my roommates and came home to a stupidly ugly couch in the living room. I have been replaced.
I was denied health insurance and I'm more confused than anything else.
One time I got up at seven and then died.
Do you ever drop a blueberry in your kitchen and then just think "oh well"?
@Girly_Juice yuss I'm in! improv soup for the soul
How do I move forward knowing the irreparable damage I've already caused to my schnoz? Also who has a tissue all of the time anyway? Hanky?
My grandma told me if I keep wiping my nose with the back of my hand it's going to change shape and be upturned and ugly by the time I'm 50.
I moved into a house without a laundry machine three months ago and I think I've only done laundry twice and who knew I owned so many socks.

"Are you there, God? It's me, Steph."
"... new phone who dis."
ðŸ’”ðŸ˜«
URGENT CHRISTMAS UPDATE. My brother's Chinese Zodiac sign is a MONKEY not, as previously reported, a rat. I'm so sorry for the error.
If I eat one carrot can I have another five Christmas cookies?
I'm not ungrateful just thought it worth revealing that I cried in my last three improv classes.
Has anyone ever yelled at you for asking "would you like some spaghetti?" not enthusiastically enough? Yeah, me neither.
UGH I just dropped yogurt on my knee
"Look it's a picture of my brother on an elephant." "Oh, the rat." "What?" "His Chinese horoscope."
My to do list is as follows: - laundry (crossed off) - grad school
I'm so excited to buy socks and then go to improv class. Also a kid just stood up and peed his pants and I need a tetanus shot (unrelated).
K but HAVE you ever had peanut butter m&m's?
Love my bebs @ The Monkey Vault Movement Training Centre https://t.co/lXO34FBS1g
@HollyIsWyder you and this random guy on the other side of the planet would get along https://t.co/GCe8z0OtHy
@HollyIsWyder Holly this is so gross
If you've never felt terror just google "sea turtle throat"
Vibin with the weird kid at the back of the class who also walked into the wrong room and decided to stay because you can't fake fate brutha
@Girly_Juice I LOVE ALL THAT IS YOU
Hey @HollyIsWyder what are you doing tonight?
@thesketchersons of course!
Just discovered that @HollyIsWyder has also never seen Borat and this is probably why we're best friends.
"Who says *something no one says*." No one. No one says that. You are the one person trying to prove something no one thinks. (Me to myself)

Working at circus on the weekend:
Kid: Are you a kid? Me: Uh, nope! Kid: Why are you so small then? Me: Well... okay you got me there.
Oh it's gettin real https://t.co/XuwylTgeMH
@BenBeauch you know it
There's a kid flailing and sobbing on the floor of the library while his nanny tries to put his pants on and I feel a strong connection.
I just applied to be a professional cuddler because I've been told I'm v snugly and I was denied social assistance so this is my life now

I'm frightened, friends.
An American Tragedy https://t.co/HoIP3xSLfH via @newyorker
All I can think of is grade eleven world history when I learned that all nations fall. And that I wanted to live in Portland w my mom.
Just hit my funny bone and I'm genuinely distressed
Tolstoy was a prophet.
"Can we make a musically?" "No buddy, your mom says no screen time on school nights." "Come on, be cheeky."
"My new biggest fear is teenagers." - Lila, 8. Same dude. Same.

Overheard: "Are you going to be watching the election?" "Yes, we've ordered in Swiss Chalet."
Should I write a book called "Schoolyard"?
"I just don't want to be cold or go bald."
I just looked in my garbage can and all I saw were granola bar and bandaid wrappers and I guess that's how last week went.
This is so terrifying and solidifies my choice to bike always even though someone could shove me off my bike I guesâ€¦ https://t.co/Xjsy6h29CN
@PeteDeCourcy anything for food
"It's got all the elements. You know, fire, electric, water, fear, surprise..." Ronan, 7
Saw my first Sunday Night Live last night and was thoroughly impressed and delighted! Big laughs, sexy band, cute smiles @thesketchersons
Kids are soft and sweet and snotty and so loud.
It is much, much too early in the morning for noisemakers.
@BenBeauch blasphemy. Also then how will I tell yours from mine
I can't find a pencil. I also can't write in a book in pen. I have three pens. I need to underline this quote. I'm so stressed.
Sorry, I can't come to work because there's an acid cloud on my block and I've been cautioned to stay inside.
Everything is more colourful and harder to see after midnight.
I live in denial of my freckles
Kids are nuts ya know. Straight wily almonds. How do we ever calm down?
Got tipped $30 to teach a beb to somersault because the parents realized it was nine am and I'm here for another twelve hours. Bless you.
Walked into a bank branch today and have never been more well received in ma life. Bring cookies everywhere you go, I guess. Ppl listen
@_ErinSylvester it's heaven. I hit up Hot Oven bakery on roncy. Also one near Runnymede. So worth it.
Just discovered almond pretzels. Welcoming winter weight gain with open arms and mouth and wallet.
@PeteDeCourcy don't u know it
I took the day off kids to put cookies in bags and curl ribbons. Not sure about the future but heck I got free luncâ€¦ https://t.co/tZT3EMy9j2
Seriously how much power do librarians have.
"Sometimes you have to 'yes, and' your own catastrophe." I pay for improv instead of therapy because it feels more socially acceptable.
"It's easier to behave when we know who we are to each other." What I learned in improv last night. What I am applying to ma lyfe.
Mom: I know why you spend three hours a day wiping noses, it's so you have time to write. Me: I still can't pay my rent. ðŸ¤‘
I just applied for a job with a Haiku because I'm running out of ideas guys.
I just spent $20 buying the kids ice cream because I'm running out of ways to make them love me is this what parenthood is dear god
"The job market was so dismal I had a better chance at surviving by scraping by as a fringe performer."a Dad to me. As I wipe his son's nose
At four thirty in the morning you can eat as many granola bars as you want/can because what happens after three and before five isn't real.
S1:E1 "Downer Ending" of @BoJackHorseman is an under-thirty-minute encompassment of all I am and fear.
Gracious Bitch: A Memoir
Openly weeping in public because I'm allowed to feel sorry for myself.
"Writing is a hellish task, best snuck up on, whacked on the head, robbed and left for dead." MacDonald again, right.
"When you look closely, however, you can see that they all have the thing in their eye. The result of an accident or a gift." AM MacDonald
Calcium magnesium. Chamomile tea. Something put me to sleep, please. Back rubs? Dry reading?
At the eleventh hour, the self-doubt begins to creep up on you. Fear not, though, we can only bring the best we can. And that's gotta b okay
"There's no unqueasy way to go out of this world." - Drew Gray, of a bio-crematorium. Idk if you want to google it or not.
It's weird that things are only gross if you notice/ know about them.
I basically aspire to be all that is Don Gillmor.
A Poet Self-Destructs https://t.co/wZKwUR7YNm "Art is nothing but loose ends." Amen brutha. This one hit me.
Kid gets kicked in the crotch, decides 2 hang low w me 2 recover and read. "My book's about lego ninjas." "Oh, that sounds cool." "I know."
"They keep coming up 2 me and saying 'weird species.'" "Huh, are they playing a game?" "Idk" "Wanna hang out with me for a bit? "No thank u"
Board-Game Theory https://t.co/2Dxqm0gRtc my bffla works here too "in the world of games, failure is necessary to success." Awesome
What plagues me? The infinite number of "Subscribe Now!" inserts that fall from me like breadcrumbs leaving a trail. I already subscribe.
Again, two big wins last night.
@HollyIsWyder wtf what the actual f
Sweet dreams to all you lovers and poets
